column1: 712311,Metal Rolling Mill Operator,,"Disassemble equipment for maintenance or repair
column3: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column7: Install mechanical components in production equipment
column9: Instruct workers to use equipment or perform technical procedures
column11: Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column13: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
column15: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column23: Polish materials, work pieces or finished products
column25: Read work orders or other instructions to determine product specifications or materials requirements
column27: Reshape metal work pieces to established specifications
column29: Review blueprints or other instructions to determine operational methods or sequences
column31: Select production equipment according to product specifications
column33: Set equipment guides, stops, spacers or other fixtures
column35: Sort materials or products for processing, storing, shipping or grading
column37: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements",nan
